about.title: What is EcoVault?
about.description: EcoVault is a token on the Sui network that combines automatic deflation with an investment fund dedicated to flora, fauna and ecosystem restoration projects.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.subtitle: Distribution, fees and burns
tokenomics.description: The token distribution ensures equity, sustainability, and commitment to the community.
tokenomics.deflationaryDescription: With each transaction, 1% of tokens are permanently burned, reducing the total supply and potentially increasing the value over time.
